description:
Revisionist History Note - First released in 2020, and still maintained, this is the first ever (as far as I can tell) Hue controller for webOS.
An elegant night stand clock and white noise generator -- with a twist. It also doubles as a Hue light controller
The clock face is customizable, allowing you to select size, color, and night time dim mode. With a tap on the clock face, you can bring up the command bar, and switch to the lamp controller, with discrete controls for two lamps, and general controls for as many bulbs as you want. The lamp controller automatically fades back to the clock at your screen timeout, so you can roll over in bed and forget about it.
versionNote:
Version 1.0.1 - TouchPad optimization and 24-hour time support.
Version 1.0.2 - Layout and command bar bug fixes.
Version 1.0.3 - Resolves a bug where changing Dim level caused Settings to be purged on next launch
Version 1.0.4 - Resolves a bug with screen lock on TouchPad.
Version 1.0.5 - Fixes for Touchpad layout and sleep settings, correct midnight in 12-hour mode.
Version 1.0.6 - Layout fixes for Pre3, fixes bug with Preferences.
Version 1.0.7 - Fixes scrolling bug, improves dim-dark logic, other improvements to preference management and updater.
Version 1.0.8 - Layout improvements on all devices, especially Pre 2.
Version 1.0.9 - Resolves issues enumerating Lights on some bridges. Thanks Fred!
Version 1.1.0 - Dim lightbar and improved transitions.
Version 2.0.0 - Exhibition mode support, and vertical orientation support since that was required for Exhibition
Version 2.0.1 - Address layout issues that caused the clock to float around the screen. Also fixed issues on Lamp and Preferences scenes.
Version 2.0.2 - Address a layout issue in the lamp scene that caused the lights to load off-center in vertical orientation when launched by Exhibition.
Version 2.0.3 - Address a layout issue in the lamp scene in Exhibition mode
Version 2.1.0 - Adds a white noise generator to help you fall asleep! Choose from 3 built-in sounds that run for 10 minutes, or set Preferences to have them loop until stopped.
Version 2.1.1 - Add preference for white noise button, address layout issue on Pre3
